name: Ghost Rhost
description:
-GHOST RHOST-

A game about getting trapped in a (GASP) haunted house with your "friends" and trying to escape.

Quite possibly one of the crassest things I've ever done.

Contains language, harsh language, sexual themes, crude humor, body horror, and mentions of more serious and unfunny topics.

My very first game, this was meant to get my feet wet and just have fun. It's pretty simple. Gameplay takes 30-45 mins or so.
